jobs.title: Marketing Design Lead
duties: Owned all marketing collateral (one sheets, sales decks, etc.) for sales and customer service teams
Conceptualized and executed on trade show & presentation designs, including large scale print materials (booth wraps, etc)
Recent projects included owning the art direction and project management for the COVID Insight Hub, and executing on weekly deck designs and social media campaigns for successful webinar series

jobs.title: Cross-Functional Designer (contract)
duties: Collaborated with marketing, product, executive team in conceptualization and execution of brand refresh
Owned the design and execution of Rocketrip case studies in collaboration with sales team and enterprise customers (ex. Twitter, Kelloggs, H&M)

jobs.title: Freelance Graphic Designer
duties: Strategized, designed, and executed on countless web, social media, and traditional print advertising projects for eCommerce and small business clients looking to expand marketplace reach

jobs.title: Freelance Consultant
jobs.organization: Ecommerce Operation and Brand Stratedy Consulting
duties: Worked with small businesses to improve web and marketplace presence
Developed and optimized private eCommerce websites
Collaborated with clients on white label brand development
